com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service

Class SessionBeanService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service.SessionBeanService

  • @Service
public class SessionBeanService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a session listener. Whenever a session scoped bean of CustomizedNewsService s created, it adds its reference to sessionBeans list. This is used the the scheduler service when update is triggered and needs to refresh all custom users article list.
    Since:
    2020-05-19
    Author:
    Sujan Kumar Mitra
